es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter
Class Action

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
Documented, HasTargetId, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomAction
public class Action
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Documented, HasTargetId

An action that can be done during the game.
